jd: Dear Vendor Partner,My name is Akash Raj Srivastava, and I represent VBeyond Corporation, a global recruitment firm with 18+ years of industry experience. We specialize in sourcing and placing highly skilled talent to meet the unique needs of our clients.Our client is seeking a ServiceNow Project Manager for a Remote position. Please share if you have any suitable candidate for this role – PLEASE SHARE PROFILES WITH 10+ YEARS OF EXPERIENCE, LOCAL TO CALIFORNIA OR PST-TIME ZONE REQUIRED. CANDIDATES ON H1B VISAS ARE PREFERRED. Job Title: ServiceNow Project ManagerLocation: RemoteDuration: Long Term ContractExperience:Role Overview: Lead key internal and external initiatives, focusing on adding value to customers and driving organizational innovation.Project Management:Oversee cross-functional projects and manage senior executives and customer relationships.Provide regular updates to customers and internal teams.Guide each project phase, managing both internal and external cross-functional teams.Strategic Initiatives: Participate in initiatives that influence project direction and strategy.Develop and present value propositions to customers.Mentorship: Mentor team members to meet engagement goals and support customer objectives.Performance Management: Identify and address gaps in project performance.Experience Requirements:6+ years in the high-tech/SaaS industry.8+ years in Customer Engagement or Project Management.Experience implementing or supporting ServiceNow products.Technical & Soft Skills:Strong cross-functional project management, including planning, scheduling, and reporting.Excellent documentation, presentation, negotiation, and facilitation skills.Proficiency with data analytics, metrics, and KPIs for customer performance tracking.Desirable Skills: Knowledge of ServiceNow ITAM and ServiceNow CMP Please share your consultant’s updated resume along with their visa copy, photo ID, and I-94 details.
